dataIdInfo.idPurp: The intended purpose of this dataset is to provide tabular data that represent aboveground vegetation biomass for specific coastal vegetative communities.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Aboveground Vegetation Biomass data can be downloaded by project, CRMS (Coastwide Reference Monitoring System) site, or station number. These data are collected from areas that represent specific vegetative communities and are collected at approximately 5-year intervals. Parameters sampled include: aboveground live and dead vegetation biomass, vegetation species present, number of plant stems, total carbon, total nitrogen, and total phosphorus.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: These data were created through a cooperative agreement between the Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) and the U.S. Geological Survey, Wetland and Aquatic Research Center.

Consts.useLimit: Information that fulfills this data request has been carefully prepared from the best available sources of data. It is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be considered authoritative for navigational, engineering, other site-specific uses, or any other uses. The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) does not warrant or guarantee its accuracy, nor does CPRA assume any responsibility or liability for any reliance thereon. Elevation measurements are dependent upon the choices of standards that were used, including: vertical datums, geoids, ellipsoids, and various other factors. These factors should be considered when comparing elevation data between stations.

dataExt.exDesc: Louisiana Coastal Zone. No end date, data updated continually.

enttyp.enttypd: Tabular data that represent aboveground vegetation biomass for specific coastal vegetative communities.
enttyp.enttypds: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Alphanumeric value assigned to a station by CPRA used for identification purposes.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Alphanumeric value assigned to a station by CPRA used for identification purposes (i.e., CRMS0527-E01)

attr.attrdef: Month, day, and year that the data were collected (mm/dd/yyyy).
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Month, day, and year that the data were collected (i.e. 01/29/2001)

attr.attrdef: Size of sample plot.
attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)

attrdomv.udom: Size of sample plot (i.e., 0.25).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Mass of aboveground living matter in total plot.

attrdomv.udom: Mass of aboveground living matter in total plot (i.e., 905.76).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Mass of aboveground dead matter in total plot.

attrdomv.udom: Mass of aboveground dead matter in total plot (i.e., 703.04).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: The unique genus & species name in use for the plant at the time the plant was observed.

attrdomv.udom: The unique genus & species name in use for the plant at the time the plant was observed (i.e., Spartina patens (Aiton) Muhl.).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: The non-unique, non-scientific name in use for the plant at the time the plant was observed.

attrdomv.udom: The non-unique, non-scientific name in use for the plant at the time the plant was observed (i.e., Marshhay Cordgrass).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: The most current officially-recognized unique genus & species name in use for the plant.

attrdomv.udom: The most current officially-recognized unique genus & species name in use for the plant (i.e., Spartina patens (Aiton) Muhl.).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: The most current officially-recognized, but non-unique & non-scientific, name in use for the plant.

attrdomv.udom: The most current officially-recognized, but non-unique & non-scientific, name in use for the plant (i.e., Marshhay Cordgrass).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Number of live stems in the plot for the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Number of live stems in the plot for the species indicated (i.e., 58).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Average height of live stems in the plot for the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Average height of live stems in the plot for the species indicated (i.e., 156.7).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Standard error of live stem height in plot.

attrdomv.udom: Standard error of live stem height in plot (i.e., 6).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Average diameter of live stems in the plot for the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Average diameter of live stems in the plot for the species indicated (i.e., 3.8).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Standard error of live stem diameter in plot.

attrdomv.udom: Standard error of live stem diameter in plot (i.e., 0.4).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Mass per area of live leaves and stems of the species indicated in the aboveground sample.

attrdomv.udom: Mass per area of live leaves and stems of the species indicated in the aboveground sample (i.e., 374.6).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Sum of organic and inorganic carbon present in leaf samples of the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Sum of organic and inorganic carbon present in leaf samples of the species indicated (i.e., 452.35).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Sum of all nitrogen compounds present in leaf samples of the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Sum of all nitrogen compounds present in leaf samples of the species indicated (i.e., 10.05).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Sum of all phosphorus compounds in leaf samples of the species indicated.

attrdomv.udom: Sum of all phosphorus compounds in leaf samples of the species indicated (i.e., 840).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Agency that collected the data.

attrdomv.udom: Agency that collected the data (i.e., U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY [USGS]).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Names of personnel that collected the data.

attrdomv.udom: Names of personnel that collected the data (i.e., Hamm K)

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Additional comments regarding Aboveground Biomass Data.

attrdomv.udom: Additional comments regarding Aboveground Biomass Data (i.e., No target species present).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Latitude (Y value) recorded in decimal degrees.

attrdomv.udom: Latitude (Y value) recorded in decimal degrees (i.e., 30.30369025).

attr.attrdefs: The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA)
attr.attrdef: Longitude (X value) recorded in decimal degrees.

attrdomv.udom: Longitude (X value) recorded in decimal degrees (i.e., -90.32545313).

Consts.useLimit: Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) Disclaimer: The information in this database has been carefully prepared from the best available sources of data. It is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be considered authoritative for navigational, engineering, other site-specific uses, or any other uses. The Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) does not warrant or guarantee its accuracy, nor does CPRA assume any responsibility or liability for any reliance thereon.

LegConsts.othConsts: It is strongly recommended that this data is directly acquired from the originator described above and or from another Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority of Louisiana (CPRA) server and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. The originator makes no claims as to the data's suitability for other purposes.
